Name: minimize_overbooked_workers
Description: Constrain selection to avoid assigning unavailable workers

Name: minimize_out_of_scope_features
Description: Exclude features not present in current product backlog

Name: minimize_unready_user_stories
Description: Only include stories that satisfy acceptance criteria readiness

Name: minimize_inactive_projects
Description: Ensure project status is active before scheduling sprints

Name: minimize_excessive_team_size_change
Description: Limit rapid fluctuations in team size between sprints

Name: minimize_low_experience_scrum_master
Description: Prefer retrospectives moderated by experienced Scrum Masters

Name: minimize_unplanned_release_items
Description: Only include features listed in release plan

Name: minimize_overcrowded_reviews
Description: Keep review attendee count within effective bounds

Name: minimize_high_severity_open_blockers
Description: Prevent tasks from starting when severe blockers are open

Name: minimize_low_quality_docs
Description: Ensure feature documentation exists before release

Name: minimize_roadmap_misalignment
Description: Ensure release plans align with roadmap milestones/objectives
